Literature.Title: Bacterial Lipodepsipeptides and Some of Their Derivatives and Cyclic Dipeptides as Potential Agents for Biocontrol of Pathogenic Bacteria and Fungi of Agrarian Plants
Literature.Author: Castaldi S, Cimmino A, Masi M, Evidente A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas caryophylli NCPPB 349(no activity data),Pseudomonas syringae pv. panici ICMP 3955(no activity data),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tabaci ICMP 2706(no activity data),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae B475(no activity data),Pseudomonas syringae pv. japonica ICMP 6305(no activity data),Bacillus subtilis PY79(MIC=0.3µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium QMB(MIC=0.3µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(no activity data),Colletotrichum truncatum 17-5-5(MIC=3µg/ml)
